attributes.action: Create greater scrutiny of exam boards in the review/remarking of exam scripts.
attributes.background: As a teacher I am disturbed by the number of 'reviews' that did not go up this year in our school. It appears that exam board policy has changed and no scripts are being awarded a new grade despite gross mismarking.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
